Source   Edit  

NimCP - Easy Model Context Protocol (MCP) server implementation for Nim

This module provides a high-level, macro-based API for creating MCP servers that integrate seamlessly with LLM applications.

Imports

nimcp/types, nimcp/protocol, nimcp/server, nimcp/mcpmacros
